backend/main.mo: Defines item, user, and lost‑found data models, access control, email validation, and state maps for a marketplace canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, affected files, components, and test IDs for footer rebuild and integration validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short build-planning summaries for major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global layout with Header, Footer, and ProfileSetup.
frontend/src/components/AddItemModal.tsx: Modal for creating items with image uploads, validation, and detailed error categorization.
frontend/src/components/AuthResolutionEr: Displays timeout, access‑denied, or general error states during profile/auth resolution.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmati: Alert dialog for confirming item deletion with cancel and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAddButto: Floating circular action button used to trigger item creation flows.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, an about section, and a dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, search, authentication controls, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item with image, price, details, and optional contact or delete actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Provides a modal for login or signup using Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAvatarMen: Shows a user avatar dropdown with profile info and a logout option.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Handles onboarding flow for creating a user profile and answering initial questions with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks using React Query, adding error categorization, retry logic, and backend actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Static About page describing UniXange’s mission and features for university students.
frontend/src/pages/BuySection.tsx: Page for browsing and filtering marketplace items, including item deletion, network error handling, and ownership checks.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Static Contact page listing support, feedback, and help information for UniXange users.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, category navigation buttons, and previews of recent buy and rental items. Uses data-fetching hooks and navigation to marketplace sections.
frontend/src/pages/LostFoundSection.tsx: Displays lost and found items with tabs, supports adding and deleting items, and enforces authentication and profile checks. Handles modals for posting, deleting, and login.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, retention, rights, and security. Contains structured sections with headings and text content.
frontend/src/pages/RentSection.tsx: Shows rental items and allows authenticated users with valid profiles to list new rentals and delete their items. Handles network errors, modals, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SellSection.tsx: Lists items posted for sale by the authenticated user, with functionality to add and delete listings. Implements profile checks, error handling, and modal workflows.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: React page rendering the Terms of Service with sections covering eligibility, user responsibilities, prohibited activities, and liability.
frontend/src/utils/adminEmailAllowlist.t: Defines an allowlist of admin emails and provides helpers to check and retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/authIntent.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing the user's login/signup intent in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides a helper to wrap a promise with a timeout that rejects after a specified duration.
frontend/src/utils/universityEmail.ts: Validates university emails or allowlisted admin emails and returns related error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests related to rebuilding the app footer.
